caption.p: Percent anticholinesterase and antioxidant potential of extract/fractions of Ferula ammoniacum (D. Don) aerial parts. {( A) Percent inhibition potential of extract/fractions for AChE and ( B) BChE; ( C) DPPH and ( D) ABTS free radical. The data are expressed as Mean ± SEM, ( n = 3). One-way ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s post hoc multiple comparison test to determine the values of p. Values are significantly different as compare to positive control, * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01, *** p < 0.001}.
